TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PropertyFilterAttribute extends System.Attribute

Docs.summary: Specifies which properties should be reported by type descriptors, specifically the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetProperties%2A> method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The PropertyFilterAttribute [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] supports an internal mechanism that limits the number of properties on a type that are returned by the custom <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject> type descriptor. If the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] is found, the type descriptor narrows the scope of returned properties. PropertyFilterAttribute differs from typical [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr#plural](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattrsharpplural-md.md)] because you cannot apply it to a class as metadata. The filter mechanism works through code instead of through static metadata.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterOptions filter) cil managed

Docs.param: The options that describe this property filter.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewk](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewk-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool Equals(object value) cil managed

Docs.param: The object to compare to this .
Docs.summary: Returns a value that indicates whether the current [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] is equal to a specified object.
Docs.returns: if the specified is equal to the current ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks This implementation compares the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterOptions> values on each <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute> for value equality. If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterOptions> are the same, then the two <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute> instances are equal.

Docs.summary: Gets the filter options for this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks The value of Filter is the same value as was provided for the `filter` constructor argument when this <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute> was constructed. There is no other means of setting the Filter value.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 GetHashCode() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the hash code for the current [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool Match(object value) cil managed

Docs.param: The object to compare. This object is expected to be a .
Docs.summary: Returns a value that indicates whether the property filter options of the current [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] match the property filter options of the provided object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For attributes that store flags, which is true for <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute>, a Match result may be different from an <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute.Equals%2A> result. For example, a filter of <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterOptions> matches a filter of <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterOptions>, because <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterOptions> is a merge of all filter values.
